house_listing.house_description: Outstanding potential! This 3 bedroom home has 2 full baths-2 car detached garage has separate hot water heater-is being used as beauty shop by tenant large rear yard and long side driveway. Notice r2 zoning! Please show onlypre-qualified buyers & all offers must have pre-qualification letter. Call tenant to show-please be courteous! Fha appraisal in at $138,500.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Home Warranty, North Facing, Window Blinds
